title: Spicy vegetarian lentil loaf with pumpkin sauce
ingredients: ['For the loaf', '125g (4 1/2 oz) red split lentils', '125g (4 1/2 oz) yellow split lentils', '1-2 green chillies, seeded and roughly chopped', '1-2 dried red chillies, seeded and roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 tablespoon curry leaves', '1 tablespoon roughly chopped ginger', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', 'salt to taste', '60g (2 1/4 oz) onions, finely chopped', 'For the sauce', '225g (8 oz) pumpkin or butternut squash, peeled and cut into 2.5cm (1 in) cubes', '1 to 2 green chillies, seeded and roughly chopped', '10 to 12 curry leaves', '1 tablespoon roughly chopped ginger', '1 teaspoon sugar', '175g (6 oz) low-fat natural yoghurt', '2 teaspoons sunflower oil', '1/2 teaspoon black mustard seeds', '1 dried red chilli, deseeded and roughly chopped', 'To garnish', 'chopped fresh coriander', 'curry leaves']
